content: worry wyrm crochet pattern by thalia evans you ll need - 3 5mm crochet hook - dk yarn of your choice - very small amount of stuffing yarn scraps will do for this - needle scissors stitch marker - for the eyes black or contrasting and white embroidery thread or alternatively small safety eyes or two 4mm beads approx finished size 6-7 inches long pattern uses us terms single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet popcorn = popcorn increase = increase 2 single_crochet in same stitch decrease = decrease sc2 together pattern is one continuous strand of yarn limbs are crocheted in place where indicated there is no need to fasten_off until the very end the example dragon was crocheted right handed if you hold the hook in your left hand you will have to mirror the photos head note the head is crocheted in continuous spiral rounds do not join the rounds flip the piece as soon as possible and ensure the right side is facing out the horns are made using a 3dc popcorn dc3 in same stitch remove working loop from hook insert hook front to back through the first double_crochet pull the working loop through and pull tight when the head is completed do not fasten_off instead continue to the tail instructions 1 chain 2 single_crochet 6 in the 2nd chain from hook 6 2 increase every other stitch 9 3 single_crochet 4 chain 2 single_crochet 2 chain 2 sc3 9 the chains will form small bumps for the nostrils 4 single_crochet around 9 make sure to skip the chain 2s you made last round and push the bumps that are formed to the right side of the work 5 single_crochet around 9 6 single_crochet 1 increase single_crochet 2 increase increase single_crochet 2 increase 13 7 single_crochet around 13 8 single_crochet 6 popcorn single_crochet 2 popcorn single_crochet 3 13 9 single_crochet 3 decrease single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 2 decrease 10 at the end of this round add safety eyes if you are using them stuff the head 10 decrease around or if easier skip every other stitch 5 make 1 slip_stitch in the 3rd stitch of the last round to close the hole do not cut yarn or fasten off you will use the working loop to start the body chain round 3 completed skip the round 8 make a 3dc popcorn round 8 completed the little bars chains in red next round stitch for each horn in red under each horn count as a stitch after the last round make a slip_stitch here finished head the working loop will be the start of the body chain tail 1 chain 66 2 to create the tail fin work the following into the 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 1 chain 2 single_crochet 2 chain 3 single_crochet 2 chain 2 sc1 3 single_crochet 1 into the next chain 4 single_crochet 4 into each of the next 15 chains 5 half_double_crochet 4 into each of the next
